response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us, but its worth to you is equally important. After careful consideration, we propose to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. We believe this offers a fair balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 950000}
